import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispactch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispactch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const {loading, error, users} = userList useEffect(() =>{ dispatch(listUsers()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Users

{loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : ( {users.map(user => { })}
ID NAME EMAIL ADMIN
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ) : ()}
) }
) } export default UserListScreen
